Title: Relates to criteria for certification by the division of minority and women's business development of MWBE status; repealer
Summary: Relates to criteria for certification by the division of minority and women's business development of MWBE status.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to criteria for certification by the division of minority and women's business development of minority and women-owned business enterprise status; and to repeal subdivision 19 of section 310 of such law relating to the definition of personal net worth
